gen:link.msg:message: Het totaal van `OtherReceivablesOtherCurrentMaturityExceedingOneYear` gerapporteerd met `ReceivablesOtherCurrentAxis` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `OtherReceivablesOtherCurrentMaturityExceedingOneYear` zonder `ReceivablesOtherCurrentAxis`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetTOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentMaturityExceedingOneYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetTOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentMaturityExceedingOneYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetNTOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentMaturityExceedingOneYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetNTOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentMaturityExceedingOneYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OtherReceivablesOtherCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_OtherReceivablesOtherCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_OtherReceivablesOtherCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesReceivablesOtherCurrentSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfOtherReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
